arts.ttl: Broadcast information for USA vs. South Korea – Time and channel to watch the match
arts.sum: South Korea will face the United States this Saturday at 11 PM (French time), but the match will not be broadcast in France. The friendly match will take place at Red Bull Arena in Harrison. One Paris Saint-Germain player, Lee Kang-in (a 24-year-old attacking midfielder/winger), will be playing for the South Korean team.
